A nurse has shared a bleak 'How it started... How it's going' tweet to show the toll coronavirus is taking on frontline workers.
Kathryn, who started working as a nurse in Tennessee eight months ago… [+2074 chars]

articles.title: Will West Berkshire return to Tier 1? - Reading Chronicle
articles.description: WEST Berkshire may return to Tier 1 restrictions when the national lockdown ends.
articles.content:
WEST Berkshire may return to Tier 1 restrictions when the national lockdown ends.
Cllr Lynne Doherty, leader of West Berkshire Council, said: “Our numbers would suggest we will go back to Tier 1.
